overview: Filmed at the Brisbane Convention & Exhibition Centre, Steve Hughes delivers a 1 and a half hour set of hard-edged comedy and truth-bombs to the Freedom Summits crowd.  If you like your stand-up with a dose of heavy-hitting social commentary and delivered by a heavy metal dude, then this one's for you. Recently back in Australia after living in the UK, where he's tearing up stages and TV shows with his fearless, politically incorrect sets, Steve will bring his no holds bar style of comedy for a change of pace and energy to the Freedom Summits.
title: Round 2 - Heavy Metal Comedy
